title: (x) Help with a font, modern sans serif - Mic 32 New {Ryuk}
content:
Hello everybody.  
I'm desperately trying to find what is the font used by the Opera National de Bordeaux.

It is their main font, used in their visual identity below the logo that looks like an O.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131013120210im_/http:/typophile.com/files/onb-logo_6652.gif)

More examples at [http://www.opera-bordeaux.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20131013120210/http:/www.opera-bordeaux.com/ "http://www.opera-bordeaux.com")  
Thanks a lot
